item.description: In celebration of Women's History month, we are having a 'Ladies Tea/Brunch' at V Organic Cafe & Art Gallery. Vegan menu is listed on website. Art gallery will feature the work of local female artists. Hats and tea attire are mandatory. Hat contest and more fun at this special event. Please like us on FB and check out details on our website. http://vorganiccafe.com/ Hoping my veggie peeps will support and pass the word. Peace......V.
item.name: Celebration of Women's History Month 'Ladies Tea Party & Brunch'
